CryEditorPlugin(EditorSchematyc PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "Sandbox/Plugins")
target_compile_definitions(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE -DSCHEMATYC_PLUGIN_EXPORTS)
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT}
